greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace n with concatenation of its nontrivial odd divisors.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: | otherwise = read $ concat $ (map show) $ delete n $ tail $ a182469_row n
nontrivial_odd_divisors = [d for d in divisors(n)[1:-1] if d%2 == 1]
else: return int("".join(str(d) for d in nontrivial_odd_divisors))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 70)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Dec 31 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
